testCase.name: API Key Authentication Integration - should return 401 if no API key is provided

API Key Authentication Middleware - Authentication Flow - should skip API key validation if user is already authenticated
API Key Authentication Middleware - Authentication Flow - should attach API key info to request when validation succeeds
API Key Authentication Middleware - Authentication Flow - should call next with error when API key validation fails
API Key Authentication Middleware - Authentication Flow - should handle IP address restrictions

API Key Authentication Middleware - Basic Validation - should validate API key from Authorization header
API Key Authentication Middleware - Basic Validation - should validate API key from query parameter
API Key Authentication Middleware - Basic Validation - should prioritize Authorization header over query parameter
API Key Authentication Middleware - Concurrent Validation - should handle concurrent API key validations
API Key Authentication Middleware - Concurrent Validation - should handle concurrent validation with rate limiting
API Key Authentication Middleware - Error Handling - should handle repository validation errors

API Key Authentication Middleware - Error Handling - should handle empty API key in header
API Key Authentication Middleware - Error Handling - should handle invalid API key in query parameter
API Key Authentication Middleware - Error Handling - should handle expired API key
API Key Authentication Middleware - Error Handling - should handle inactive API key
API key validation with IP restrictions - should reject empty API key

API key validation with IP restrictions - should reject non-existent API key
API key validation with IP restrictions - should reject revoked API key

API key validation with IP restrictions - should reject request from unauthorized IP
API key validation with IP restrictions - should allow request from authorized IP
ApiKeyRepository - createApiKey - should create a new API key
ApiKeyRepository - update - should update an existing API key
ApiKeyRepository - revokeApiKey - should revoke an existing API key
ApiKeyRepository - validateApiKey - should validate a correct API key
ApiKeyRepository - validateApiKey - should respect IP restrictions

API Key Revocation - revokeApiKey - should return false when key is not found
API Key Revocation - revokeApiKey - should return false when user does not own the key
API Key Revocation - revokeApiKey - should handle errors during key revocation
API Key Revocation - revokeApiKey - should handle already revoked keys
API Key Routes - should have tests
initializeAzureServices - should initialize real services in non-test environment
initializeAzureServices - should initialize mock services in test environment
initializeAzureServices - should handle errors during blob storage initialization
initializeAzureServices - should handle errors during cosmos DB initialization
initializeAzureServices - should handle errors during mock blob storage initialization
initializeAzureServices - should handle errors during mock cosmos DB initialization
Data API - should return data with status 200 when authenticated
Data API - should filter data by date range
Data API - should filter data by category
Data API - should limit results when limit parameter is provided
Error Handler Middleware - should handle generic errors with a 500 status code
Error Handler Middleware - should handle validation errors with a 400 status code
Error Handler Middleware - should handle unauthorized errors with a 401 status code
Error Handler Middleware - should handle forbidden errors with a 403 status code
Error Handler Middleware - should handle not found errors with a 404 status code
Error Handler Middleware - should handle file size limit errors with a 413 status code
Error Handler Middleware - should handle invalid file type errors with a 400 status code
Error Handler Middleware - should include stack trace in development environment
processExcelFile - should successfully process a valid Excel file
processExcelFile - should return an error for an invalid Excel file format
processExcelFile - should return an error if no worksheets are found
processExcelFile - should return an error if no data rows are found (only headers)
processExcelFile - should handle null and undefined cell values correctly
processExcelFile - should return a general error if an unexpected error occurs during processing
Auth Middleware - authenticateToken - should bypass authentication if NODE_ENV is test
Auth Middleware - authenticateToken - should return 401 if no token is provided and not in test environment
Auth Middleware - authenticateToken - should return 403 if token is invalid and not in test environment
Auth Middleware - authenticateToken - should attach decoded token to request and call next if token is valid
Auth Middleware - checkRole - should bypass role check if NODE_ENV is test
Auth Middleware - checkRole - should return 403 if user has no roles
Auth Middleware - checkRole - should return 403 if user does not have required role
Auth Middleware - checkRole - should call next if user has required role
Auth Middleware - checkRole - should call next if no roles are required
Rate Limiting Middleware - should allow requests under the limit
Rate Limiting Middleware - should block requests over the limit
Rate Limiting Middleware - should reset the counter after the window expires
Rate Limiting Middleware - should use API key as the rate limit key when available
Rate Limiting Middleware - should skip rate limiting when skip function returns true
Sanity Test - should pass a basic test
Sanity Test - should have access to global test utilities
Sanity Test - should have access to Node.js globals
Sanity Test - should have access to test environment variables
createApp - should create an Express app instance
